sub_title: Lead Electrical & Systems Engineer at Lagerwey
summary: Dynamic and enthusiastic individual with experience in electrical, electronic and control systems engineering. I have a genuine interest in technology, am always up to a challenge and love to learn. My educational background and professional work experience have led me to develop excellent technical and analytical skills as well as communication, leadership and managerial skills. Others will describe me as being assertive, innovative, determined and having a strong ability to translate theories and possibilities into solid plans of action.
